info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches, except up to 2 inches below 3000 feet in lower Washington County including St George. * WHERE...San Rafael Swell, Lower Washington County, Upper Sevier River Valleys and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 2 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions are possible along all area routes, especially along I-15 in Black Ridge Canyon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
